text: 31:3 Dɨboboniba 28:1--29:39Atrivim kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, ofa gamir gumaziba, an dɨvazimɨn aven an asɨzibar tongɨn asɨziba iniva ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba, zurara mɨzaraziba ko, guaratɨzibar dar amu. Egh me uaghan Sabatɨn dughiaba ko, iakɨnir igiaba ko, Godɨn ziam fer dughiar ekiaba sara, me an asɨziba inigh ofa damu, mati Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Arazir Moses fomɨra osiriziba mɨkemezɨ mokɨn.
